channel.title: Comments on: Returning a value inserted in a table with a newsequentialid() default on a uniqueidentifier column
channel.description: A Technical Community for IT Professionals

item.title: By: Jack Corbett
item.dc:creator: Jack Corbett
item.content:encoded:
OUTPUT is an underused feature and really should be used instead of @@IDENTITY or SCOPE_IDENTITY in new development also.

Of course I know you already know this.
